_sText:
surf_palm is a Tier 2 Linear map with 2 Bonuses.

The map is easy but has a lot of small skips and improvements for a better time.

Bonus 1 is an easy unit bonus.
Bonus 2 is basically pox2.

Thanks to EarthwormEd for the showcase video:


Thanks to anyone who plays this map.. Enjoy!

*Update* 1
I updated the map, cause I sort of screwed up:p It's fixed now though:) 
*Update* 2
I've got some feedback and I'm working on a v2 where I'll fix known bugs;)
*Update* 3
Ok, here's the second and fixed version:) I apologize for the inconvenience, and hope you'll try this version:)


Bravesurf presents surf_palette. 
This is a colorful, and quite easy, staged surf map.
Short walkthrough: 
At the start you can choose between the red way or the blue way. 
If you finish blue you get a glock, if you finish red you get an usp. 
Now, let's mix in some yellow. If you finished red, you can play orange. If you finished blue, you can play green. In the middle there's red and blue mixed, in other words purple. From here we add some white. Finish green and you can play light green. Finish purple, and you get to play light pink. And here's one for all you perverts, if you finish orange you get to play stage cream:p 
Anyway. After these three stages, there is a short bonus stage. If you finish this you'll get 50hp extra and armour! In addition, the timer stops, and you can choose to either wait for more people to finish, or start the round right away:)

Have fun playing, and I hope you like it. 
Also, if someone decides to make a video of it, please give me the link so I can add it here! 

Cheers!
/brave

_aChangeLog.text: The map has been bsp-zipped to reduce file size.

_sText:
surf_palais is a Tier 2 Linear map.

This map was made (in certainly less than a month) for the Spring 2020 KSF Surf Mapping Contest.

The theme given was "sunnyhappylove" so for my map I decided to go with more focus on the love aspect in my details. It generally stays simple and clean throughout, but features more intricate shapes for many of the details.

The map is on the shorter side with the average route being ~45 seconds and the fast route being ~35-40 seconds. With that being said, it's a fun experience running through the map and attempting to improve your time.

----------

I made the map pretty mindlessly to try and enjoy myself while mapping, so I hope it turned out as fun as I thought it was...

Big thanks to Sam for motivating me to work on a map for the contest, as there was a period of time I thought I would quit or not make anything. Thanks to Spy_Complex for testing my map, there were a couple big changes I wouldn't have thought to do without him. AND thanks to pretzL for testing at the end and making sure everything works correctly.

Hopefully everything WORKS PERFECTLY but if anything breaks please let me know, I'd at least like to correct any mistakes.

Map by Shr3d
Build time: 3 days
Compile time: 10 mins
You may not plagiarise my content without permission.
Have fun!

Another release of a final product?  This is the same as O_tower_f2, but instead of light entities I used environment lighting (Question: Which looks better?).  Same as before... "Simple map, really. You are able to gain new weapons on each ramp/level of the tower. If you want the new weapon be sure to drop your old one. I tested this map with the settings from the surf server I frequent, Lobster Man's Surf-n-Turf. There is a spot to get an m249, it's just a little out of the way."

I'm going to go ahead and update this as the final product.  If there are any truly devastating problems I may reconsider, but it seems to be okay.  Simple map, really.  You are able to gain new weapons on each ramp/level of the tower.  If you want the new weapon be sure to drop your old one.  I tested this map with the settings from the surf server I frequent, Lobster Man's Surf-n-Turf.  There is a spot to get an m249, it's just a little out of the way.

this is a smaller surf map though it is also a close combat map wit lots of secrets included, *kinda like fightclub*, though i have used the new idea of being able to surf out of jail but it is quite hard!

Greetings! To you all, I present surf_overgrowth, my first surf map.

It's a five-staged skill map and I designed it with smooth, open, fast surf in mind.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=INF-p73SGcU

This is one of the first surf maps I have released, but I have made a few before this one. There are 3 surf areas and 1 room at the end, there are also a few hidden rooms with guns in them so keep your eyes out.

This is only beta 2 so if you find any bugs, please e-mail me at shifts.games@gmail.com if you find any. If no one finds any I am going to leave it at Beta 2 and not release a final unless I see a reason.

 + Sh|fty

surf_orbion

Hello! This is surf_orbion. A skill surf collaboration with Billy, Eric, Helix, Razer and Sangre. The original .bsp file is a version with jail and a timer. When the map is completed the timer will be disabled. The player that has finished the map receives a machine gun and low gravity. The choice is his to either rape face or leave the others to practice.

surf_orbion X is the timerless version. This map has been optimized for servers that use a timerscript and therefore do not need an endjail.

Many, many thanks to the mappers for creating their stages. The result is amazing. Thanks guys!

Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EEK6DNSy-hQ&hd=1

There is a 5 minute timelimit to beat the map completely.

The map should be played with "sv_airaccelerate 150" for best results.

Surf_olympics

There are the four events, speed, air strafing, bunny hopping, and mix, each one will have two levels to make six, not including the last event (mix) which is just one level. That makes a total of seven levels and each event will have its own jail except event four, making a total of three jails. People on the last event will be teleported to the event three jail. Jail one weapons are the UZI or the TMP depending on if you are a CT or a T, the jail two weapons are the M4 or the AK, and the jail three weapons are just AWPs. The people who beat the map turn gold and will have a choice between all three jails, when they choose a jail they will get teleported to it but they will be in a spot of advantage and separate from the normal battleground. If you choose jail one you will get the M4 or the AK, if you go to jail two you will get an AWP, and if you go to jail three you will also get an AWP. You have just over five minutes to beat the map and if the people in jail don't kill each other and end the round within one minute they get teleported to a small area where everyone just massacres each other with the weapons they had. There are two secrets, the first is a secret red button located in level one in the shape of a grenade and when you push it once, it gives you a grenade, after its pushed 10 times it disables. There is also a secret red music button located in level seven with sparks flying out of it and its in the shape of an X, when its pushed 10 times it plays the song the final countdown; the song can only be played once per round. Both buttons turn you red if you push then so you can be identified by an admin if he doesn't want anybody pushing them. I hope I see this on some popular servers and I hope you enjoy the map!

THAY-imagine-

<font face="verdana" size="1">OldSkool
______________________________________

Made by Paper-Cut and Ryan S. 
Skybox by Paper-Cut. 
______________________________________

This map is a very loose remake of an old map that some of the original Source surfers may remember, surf_test. (No, it is NOT the version on FPSB.) I was discussing remaking this map with Ryan and he revealed that he actually made it, and it was never meant to be released, hence the name test. Anyway, here we are about 4 years since the original map debuted, with a completely new redesign and remake. The map is a bomb-site oriented map consisting of 2 bombsites. The map will play well on DM and non-DM. This map is a first of a series of classic surf remakes, be on the look out for new ones.
______________________________________

Map made for 66tick, untested on 100 and 33.
______________________________________

Install: Put the bsp into cstrike/maps folder.
______________________________________

Thanks goes out to:

Ryan Berkery, one of the co-authors of the original surf_test.
Solidsurf
Mapping Junkies (www.mapjunkies.com)
Etrigan, testing, emotional support
TAG Servers (www.tagservers.com) for testing
Ryan S would like to thank Paper-Cut for the remake
_______________________________________

Visit Solidsurf.info for more great surf maps and surf mapping tutorials.</font>
A surf map made by JukeBox/ReXisTor.

Welcome to Surf_Odyssey.

Ahead lies a test to challenge your surfing skills.

Put simply, you must surf through all the rings along the course. Should you miss one, you will be teleported back to the beggining and will have to start again.

Along the way, you will come across special rings. These can be identified by the yellow and black markings. When you surf through these, a weapon will be dispenced. The further along the course, the better the weapon.

After 5 mins, all players will be teleported to a fight arena where players will use the weapons they pick up along the surf course.

Thanks to all who helped in the testing of this map. Please come join us on our freindly surf server: 60.234.73.177:27015. You will be more than welcome.

I hope you enjoy it.

Skybox By  hipshot

Riddler
Well this is my second map. the surfing is not too hard but it is a fun map.

EDIT4:  Added more teleports to provide leniancy.  Lessened damage on pro.  Removed a few push triggers in the real jail.

EDIT3:  Added arrows.  Added a real jail that you can go to if you so choose; you can escape from it if you're good at jumping, if not you can camp.  Due to bugs, I could not put the jail in the arena.  For this jail, you have to jump on blocks that are moved via path_track entities.  The outer rim of the area pushes you also.  As for nocliping in the area, try not to do it in the rifle level (nocliping outside of it I mean) because it is very close to the boundary of the map and it can crash you.  There are no vertex buffer errors to my knowledge though oddly enough.  The shotgun and rifle levels were made slightly easier, but I didn't feel that there was any major improvement...  Added a sign that notifies you that you're going to the arena.  A sign that says PRO over the awps and HELL over the autos...  "Reverse" mode is available for jail, auto, shotty, rifle, and arena sections.  These teleporters are under the main teleporters (the ones you climb up).  In "reverse" mode, your teleport destination is rotated upside down and you have to surf as usually... it's basically like being drugged.  I have passed the rifle level with this mode... accessing another teleport afterwards will undo this mode.  Remember, after you get your gun, you are sent to the arena.  There is nothing to surf to here, it's meant for surfing/camping combat.  Autos are most valuable here, so they are the hardest to get.  I HAVE passed the jail level the entire way through if you're wondering... Took 1 point of damage... Most of the time I have problems with it though

Please note this map is a work in progress, and since I personally haven't seen it on a server yet, I don't know how well the arena section is.  If it sucks, it will be removed for a leet style surf map that circles around for constant surfing via push platforms.

BEFORE I SAY ANYTHING ELSE, THIS MAP IS DESIGNED TO BE HARD TO SURF.
Pistols at spawn.  5 choices from spawn on where you want to go (left to right):  shotgun level, rifle/smg/m249 level, arena, awp level, auto/jail level.  There are hidden awps in the shotgun and rifle levels.  Each team gets their own version of the shotgun, rifle, and awp level.  Dark blue glass and laser textures will damage you and the teal/blue/stripped glass will push you.  If you fall at any part of the map, you fall into the jail.  The jail is its own surf level; it is designed as a saving grace, or second chance, for the best surfers.  It is NOT designed to be easy enough to do on your first try; it's a good idea to look at the map in spec/noclip view so you know where to go.  Those who complete the jail level will be rewarded with auto snipers, a buy zone, bombs and a bomb site, and several devices to kill and bring people in the arena to you.

The arena is designed partially for camping and partially for surfing.  You have 2 sniping posts you can camp at, or you can pick any spot that isn't covered with a laser/dark blue glass texture.  It is possible, but difficult, to surf to the stealth bombers that circle the arena.  You can teleport to them from the end of the jail level.

BTW, for those who are trying to beat the jail level on your first try; after the drop between the two laser textures, you need to do a right 180 turn to get back onto the ramp, then you surf far down and do a left 180 turn.  The ramp below is covered with a flat damage block, so take your time here.  Next one is a left turn (180 again), you land on the same ramp.  This is followed by a right 180 turn (your space is even more limited than before) on a new ramp, then another right 180 turn, and a left 180 turn.

SO:  after you go through the long drop, it's right, left, left, right, right, left.  After that, circle around and make it to the white texture in the back.  The texture before it is a push platform that pushes you towards it, but you're on your own on height (hint, jump at the end of the push platform).  The map is possible, but hard; you've been warned.

The map has not been tested with large numbers, thus the B4 at the end of the name.

EDIT:  There is a max of 60 player slots, but I don't know if it will work with that many players.  Again, it hasn't been tested on a server yet so I need some feedback and I need to see it in action myself...

This is a remake of surf_ny_resistance; which was a homage to the original surf_rebel_resistance by ArchAngel. The map is 100% scratch built, but the borrowed themes and design are obvious. The idea was to have a similar design, but give it a quicker gameplay with more surf options. 

The map has a small problem with people camping jail once they have won. This is common with this surf maps with a terminal jail, but that is no excuse. There are a bunch of secrets, which is against my usual anti-secret creed. The map is not lit.

A continuation of the superhappy series. This map is not very new, I just realized that i forgot to put it up on fpsb. Similar to the other maps in the series; surf to gain weapons/advantages in the jail. Re-introduced the 1v1 knife arena to fight for jail release. Automatic release door closes after a timer goes off. The timer is based on how many players are on the map. The map is kind of still in beta, but I am not going to revisit it again.

Momentum is a medium/difficult surf. The purpose of the map is to gain momentum so when all paths converge on the end, you have the speed to preform well and secure a good weapon and position in an arena style jail. Prisoners knife fight in a pit.

Meant for 66 tick, works fine on 100.

This is a bit of a tribute map to surf_greatriver, my favorite map. It has a similar flow and has some obviously similar attributes. it has more ramps and is faster though, and emphasizes surfing more than sniping. It is playable by all skill levels, but it takes a bit of practice to get to the bombsite on top of jail; it was added to truncate long rounds.
